name: Elemental's - Shatered Souls
description:
Game for GDevelop GameJam #3

https://liluo.io/miguel_almeida/elemental-s---shattered-souls

It wold should be a dungeon crawler Turn Based RPG, but I realize that 7 days isn't enough to do and now its just a “RPG Battle Simulator”, the history is that your soul a broken in two parts and you will fight your  self to recover you.

Music:

Night on Bald Mountain by Skidmore College Orchestra from https://musopen.org/music/4874-night-on-bald-mountain/
 

I. Mars, the Bringer of War by USAF Heritage of America Band from https://musopen.org/music/43775-the-planets-op-32/

Key assets from https://thoseawesomeguys.com/prompts/
